title: Increases the penalties imposed upon gas and electric utilities for failure to file or correct an annual report with the public service commission
summary: Increases the penalties imposed upon gas and electric utilities for failure to file or correct an annual report with the public service commission; such penalties shall not be more than 1% of the utilities' annual net revenue for each day of violation, but not to exceed $25,000 nor be less than $100.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to penalties for the failure of gas and electric corporations to file or correct an annual report
